posts.post_content: I have 42 different T206 Southern Leaguers for sale with no qualifiers. All are PSA 5 unless noted in Piedmont 350 & Old Mill backs. E-mail me at [url]brodcards@aol.com[/url] for scans & prices. The Piedmonts backs are Hickman, Lipe, Reagan, Guiheen 5.5, Carey, Jordan, Rockenfeld, Lentz, Lafitte, Bill Hart, Carlos Smith, Paige, Kiernan 5.5, Helm, Mullaney, Fritz, Bastian, Stark, King 5.5, Westlake, Hooker, Seitz, Revelle, & Ryan. The Old Mill backs are Foster, Otey, Ellam, Coles, Violat, Breitenstein, Bernhard, Thebo, Jimmy Hart, Thornton, Shaughnessy, Howard, Sid Smith, Molesworth, Cranston, Greminger, Bay, & Miller.

The following Southern Leaguers have been sold: In Piedmont 350 backs Revelle, Carey, Paige, Jordan, Mullaney, Ellam, & Ryan. In Old Mill backs Shaughnessy. All other Southern Leaguers in PSA 5 are still available.

The following t206 Southern League cards have been sold: In Piedmont 350 Ryan, Paige, Carey, Jordan, Mullaney, & Revelle. In Old Mill backs: Ellam, Shaughnessy, Bernhard, Thebo, & Bay. All the cards are still available. Happy Thanksgiving to all on net54.
